content.en: Incontinence management: Researchers have investigated various aspects of urinary incontinence management, including findings, recommendations, guidelines, and treatment approaches. The algorithms used in these studies are developed by organizations such as the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services, the International Consultation of Incontinence (ICI) guidelines, the Canadian Urological Association, and the European Association of Urology (EAU). However, some research questions do not specify the agency of the algorithms used.
content.da: Inkontinenshåndtering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige aspekter af håndtering af urininkontinens, herunder resultater, anbefalinger, retningslinjer og behandlingsmetoder. De algoritmer, der anvendes i disse studier, er udviklet af organisationer som den amerikanske sundheds- og menneskelige tjenester afdeling, International Consultation on Incontinence (ICI) retningslinjer, Canadian Urological Association og European Association of Urology (EAU). Dog specificerer nogle forskningsspørgsmål ikke, hvilken organisation der står bag de anvendte algoritmer.
